text: Eghtɨ an arɨ nguibar ekiatamɨn aven mangɨghtɨma, Israelian mɨdorozir gumaziba benir gavgaviba inigh izɨ nguibar ekiar kamɨn dɨvaziba ikeghɨva, nguibar ekiar kam gekuigh danganir zarimɨn anekunightɨ, a bar ikuvigham. Eghtɨ nguibar ekiar kamɨn dagɨar muziaritam bar ikeghan kogham. Bar puvatɨgham.”
